compatibility.notes: CPAL-1.0 is a weak copyleft license, allowing for more flexibility in combining with other licenses compared to strong copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include a notice stating the changes made to the original code.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the executable version.
Ensure that any modifications are clearly marked.
license.name: CPAL-1.0
obligations: Must provide attribution to the original developer.
Must include a copy of the license with any distribution.
Must disclose source code when distributing the software.
Must state changes made to the original code.
